attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis oil has been scientifically proven over and over again to help combat side effects and help battle the diseases stated above, and many more conditions.
Cannabis oil is already legal is most states of American and is proving to b a remarkable drug. Why should our friends,family etc suffers horrible side effects from prescription drugs that might not be successful in helping their illness. Let's legalise cannabis oil and make a difference
attributes.background: There has been numerous tests been done to prove that cannabis oil can help combat diseases such as cancer, MS, epilepsy and other debilitating and life threatening
